mapper.sql: id , user_id, content, pic, reply, admin_id, create_time, reply_time, status, reply_status
mapper.select: SELECT f.id, f.user_id, f.content, f.pic, f.reply, f.admin_id, f.create_time, f.reply_time, f.`status`, f.reply_status, u.NAME, u.phone, u.profile_path, ai.`name` AS adminName FROM feedback f INNER JOIN USER u ON u.id = f.user_id LEFT JOIN admin_info ai ON ai.id = f.admin_id where f.id = #{id}
